io.jeo.geojson

Class GeoJSONWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.jeo.json.encoder.JSONEncoder
      • io.jeo.geojson.GeoJSONWriter
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    JeoJSONWriter

    public class GeoJSONWriter
extends JSONEncoder
    Writes out GeoJSON objects as defined by the GeoJSON Specification.

    Example: 

    
 Writer w = ...;
 Point p = ...;
 
 GeoJSONWriter writer = new GeoJSONWriter(w);
 writer.object()
 writer.key("location").point(p);
 writer.endObject();

    Author:
    Justin Deoliveira, OpenGeo

      • featureCollection

        public GeoJSONWriter featureCollection()
                                throws IOException
        Starts the encoding of a feature collection.

        This method should be followed by any number of calls to feature(Feature) and finally terminated with a call to endFeatureCollection().

        Throws:
        IOException
        See Also:
        FeatureCollection Objects
